careers.title: Software Engineer
careers.description: Designs, develops, and maintains software applications. Involves coding, debugging, and collaborating with teams to build and improve software products.

careers.title: UX Designer
careers.description: Focuses on creating user-friendly and intuitive digital products. Involves user research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing to enhance user satisfaction.

careers.title: Data Scientist
careers.description: Analyzes large, complex data sets to identify trends and make predictions. Uses statistical methods, machine learning, and data visualization to provide actionable insights.

careers.title: Cyber Security Analyst
careers.description: Protects an organization's computer networks and systems from cyber threats. Involves monitoring for security breaches, investigating violations, and implementing security measures.
